content:
Under the Loss or Damage to Your Car coverage, car accessories, including all audio, video, and other standard equipment fitted by the manufacturer or distributor at the time the car was originally purchased, are covered up to $1,000.
Under the Loss or Damage to Your Car coverage, the excess for car accident repairs is halved if repairs are carried out at an HL Assurance Approved Workshop.
questions: What items are covered under the Loss or Damage to Your Car coverage?
What is the maximum coverage amount for car accessories under the Loss or Damage to Your Car coverage?
Are video equipment and audio systems covered under the car insurance policy?
What is the benefit of having car repairs done at an HL Assurance Approved Workshop?
How does the excess for car accident repairs change when using an HL Assurance Approved Workshop?
Does the Loss or Damage to Your Car coverage include items installed by the manufacturer?
What types of standard equipment are included in the $1,000 coverage limit?
Is there a financial advantage to using an approved workshop for car repairs under this policy?
What happens to the excess fee if I choose not to use an HL Assurance Approved Workshop for repairs?
Are aftermarket car accessories covered under the Loss or Damage to Your Car coverage?
